div.head: 水穀不化
div.div: water and grain failing to transform

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: water and grain failing to transform

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with shui gu bu xiao 水穀不消 , water and grain failing to dissolve. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 28: 小腹痛，癥疝，水穀不化，宜服大平胃丸 , “For pain in the lower abdomen, concretion-illness and elevation-illness, and when water and grain fail to transform , it is advisable to ingest the ‘pills that massively pacify the stomach ’”.
